description:
Catarina Claes is finally graduating from the Magic Academy. Catarina reflects on the past two years as she talks with all of her precious friends and attends a graduation party at the castle. There, they all speak of their feelings for her, starting with Geordo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Déjà la cérémonie de remise des diplômes...
卒業式がやって来てしまった...
